import math
t = int(input())
for xx in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = 0
    t = 0
    for i in range(n):
        s += a[i]
        s -= b[i]
        t = t + abs(a[i] - b[i])
    if s == 0:
        print(t // 2)
    else:
        print(-1)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    l1 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l2 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s1 = sum(l1)
    s2 = sum(l2)
    sd = 0
    for i in range(n):
        sd += abs(l1[i] - l2[i])
    if s1 != s2:
        print(-1)
    else:
        print(sd // 2)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    A = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    B = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    count = 0
    count1 = 0
    for j in range(n):
        count += abs(A[j] - B[j])
        count1 += A[j] - B[j]
    if count1 == 0:
        print(count // 2)
    else:
        print(-1)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    cnt = 0
    for i in range(n):
        cnt += abs(a[i] - b[i])
    print([-1, cnt // 2][sum(a) == sum(b)])

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    N = int(input())
    L1 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    L2 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    L = []
    maxi = 0
    add = 0
    for j in range(N):
        L.append(L1[j] - L2[j])
        add += L[j]
        if L[j] > 0:
            maxi += L[j]
    if add == 0:
        print(maxi)
    else:
        print(-1)

r = int(input())
while r > 0:
    r = r - 1
    n = int(input())
    s = list(map(int, input('').split()))
    w = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ss = sum(s)
    sw = sum(w)
    if ss != sw:
        print(-1)
    else:
        c = 0
        for i in range(n):
            c = c + abs(s[i] - w[i])
        print(c // 2)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    y = list(map(int, input().split()))
    m = max(max(x), max(y))
    if sum(x) != sum(y):
        print(-1)
        continue
    op = 0
    for i in range(n):
        op += abs(x[i] - y[i])
    print(op // 2)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    sum = 0
    op = 0
    for i in range(n):
        diff = a[i] - b[i]
        sum += diff
        op += abs(diff)
    if sum == 0:
        print(int(op / 2))
    else:
        print('-1')

for x in range(int(input())):
    input()
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    z = [a[i] - b[i] for i in range(len(a))]
    print(sum([i for i in z if i > 0]) if sum(z) == 0 else -1)
